description:
इसेवा नेपालकै पहिलो मोबाइल खाता हो । इसेवामा खाता खोली आफ्नै मोबाइलबाट नि:शुल्क आफ्नो मोबाइल रिचार्ज, घरको बिजुली, खानेपानी, टेलिफोन, इन्टरनेट आदिको बिल भुक्तानी गरि मासिक रु ५०० देखि रु २००० सम्म बचत गर्नुहोस् । 

इसेवा कसरी प्रयोग गर्ने ? 

रजिष्ट्रेशन
इसेवाको App Download गरि Register गर्नुहोस् । यसरी Register गर्दा तपाँईको मोबाइल नम्बर नै तपाँइको इसेवा आइडी हुनेछ ।

इसेवामा पैसा जम्मा गर्न
इसेवामा चार प्रकारबाट सजिलै रकम जम्मा गर्न सकिन्छ:

१. इन्टरनेट वा मोबाइल बैंकिङ मार्फत
बैंकको खाताबाट इन्टरनेट वा मोबाइल बैंकिङ मार्फत इसेवामा नि:शुल्क रकम जम्मा गर्नुहोस। मोबाइल/इन्टरनेट बैंकिङ सेवा लिनु भएको छैन भने आजै आफ्नो बैंक को शाखामा गएर सेवा सुरु गराउनुहोस ।

२. काउण्टर डिपोजिट मार्फत
इसेवाको पार्टनर बैंक मध्ये ७ वटा बैंकबाट इसेवामा काउण्टर डिपोजिट पनि गर्न सकिन्छ । 

ग्लोबल आइएमई बैंक,
प्रभु बैंक, 
महालक्ष्मी डेभेलपमेन्ट बैंक, 
जनता बैंक,
मेगा बैंक 
ओम डेभेलपमेन्ट बैंक
कामना सेवा विकास बैंक

३. eSewa Cash Point मार्फत
तपाँईको आफ्नो टोल छिमेकमा रहेका eSewa Cash Point चिन्ह अंकित इसेवाका एजेन्ट मार्फत पनि नि:शुल्क रकम जम्मा गर्नुहोस।

४. तपाँईले अन्य इसेवा प्रयोगकर्ताबाट इसेवामा पैसा राख्न र पठाउन पनि सक्नुहुन्छ ।

इसेवामा उपलब्ध सेवाहरु:
मोबाइल रिचार्ज र टपअप
ल्याण्डलाइन बिल
हवाइजहाज र बस टिकट
बिजुली र खानेपानीको बिल भुक्तानी
इन्टरनेटको बिल भुक्तानी
टेलिभिजन रिचार्ज
मुभि टिकट
होटल बुकिङ
स्कुल फि 
इन्सुरेन्स प्रिमियम
किस्ता भुक्तानी
डिम्याट खाता दर्ता र नविकरण
क्रेडिट कार्ड बिल भुक्तानी
अनलाइन सपिङ
बैंक डिपोजिट

इसेवाको बारेमाः
eSewa fonepay Pvt. Ltd. सन् २००९ बाट सेवा दिइरहेको नेपालको पहिलो भुक्तानी सेवा प्रदायक कम्पनि हो । मोबाइल तथा इन्टरनेट बैंकिङको सफ्टवेयर प्रदायक कम्पनिमा नेपालकै अग्रणी स्थानमा रहेको F1Soft International को एक सहायक कम्पनिको रुपमा इसेवा रहेको छ ।

हाल नेपालको ७७ वटै जिल्लामा पहुँच भएको यस eSewa fonepay Pvt. Ltd. सँग १० लाख भन्दा बढि दर्ता भएका ग्राहकहरु , ४०,००० भन्दा बढि व्यवसायी (eSewa Zone/Point), ४७ बैंकहरु तथा १,५०० भन्दा बढि मर्चेन्टहरु आवद्ध रहेका छन।

थप जानकारीका लागि: १६६०-०१-०२१२१
ईमेल: csd(@)esewa.com.np


eSewa is Nepal's first payment gateway with integrated digital wallet. You can register on-the-go and save Rs. 500 - Rs. 2000 in a month. 

How to register and make payment with eSewa? 
Registration
Download eSewa app and click on Register. Your mobile number will be your eSewa ID.

Load fund to eSewa
You can load fund to your eSewa account in 4 different ways:

1.	Via Mobile/Internet Banking:
You can load eSewa wallet from your internet/mobile banking without any additional cost from 47 banks. Visit your bank branch if you have not enabled internet banking and mobile banking.

2.	Via Counter Deposit:
You can visit nearest branch of below mentioned partner banks for loading fund to your eSewa account via counter deposit:
a. Global Bank
b. Prabhu Bank
c. Mahalaxmi Development Bank
d. Janata Bank
e. Mega Bank
f. OM Development Bank
g. Kamana Sewa Bikas Bank


3.	Via eSewa Cash Point
You can visit nearest eSewa Cash Point and load fund to your eSewa wallet without additional service charge.

4.	You can also send and receive fund to your eSewa wallet from other eSewa users for free.

Services of eSewa:
Mobile recharge and TOPUP
Landline Bill
Airline and Bus Ticket
Electricity and water bill payment
Internet Bill
Television Subscription
Movie Ticket
Hotel Booking
School Fee
Insurance Premium
EMI Payment
DMAT account opening and renew
Credit Card Bill
Online Shopping
Bank Deposit

About eSewa
eSewa Fonepay Pvt. Ltd. is the first and leading Payment Service Provider, starting service from 2009 AD. eSewa is a subsidiary company of F1Soft International, leading fin-tech company in Nepal.

eSewa has it's wider coverage to all the 77 districts of Nepal. eSewa has a growing network of more than 10 lakhs registered customer, 40,000+ agents (eSewa Zone/Point), 47 banks, 1500+ merchants.

Khalti is Nepal’s most trusted digital wallet, now stronger and better through the merger of Khalti and IME Pay. This upgraded app combines IME’s trusted remittance legacy with Khalti’s digital innovation to offer a seamless and powerful experience.
More than just a payment app, Khalti stands for innovation, lifestyle, and reliability. It is designed to be inclusive, easy to use, and secure, helping you make everyday moments simpler and more meaningful.
Why the Merger?
We merged to give you a smarter, faster, and simpler wallet experience. IME Pay users can now access all Khalti features in one app, with a hassle-free migration of wallet balance, points, and transaction history. One login, one wallet, no stress.

New Features
Daami Points combine rewards from both Khalti and IME Pay into one system, so you earn more for every transaction. The Super Wallet lets you unlock new features and benefits the more you use the app. Plus, enjoy 3% interest on your wallet balance, helping your money grow while it stays safe. Smart Deposit, Nepal’s first wallet-based recurring deposit in partnership with Manjushree Finance where you can save a fixed amount regularly starting from Rs. 100 and earn good interest rates. Start Small, Dream Big!


Everything You Can Do
Top-Up & Recharge
Recharge NTC, Ncell and buy data packs
Buy recharge cards & Topup anywhere easily


Utility Bill Payments
Electricity (NEA, BPC, community providers)
Water, landline, cable TV (DishHome, Mero TV, NetTV, SimTV)
Internet bills (Worldlink, Subisu, Vianet, Classic Tech & more)
Flight Booking
Book domestic flights with real-time availability from airlines like Buddha, Yeti, Shree & more
Indrive Topup 
Drivers can do Indrive Topup easily from the App
Education Fees
Pay school and college fees directly from the app
Find your institute in our Smart Schools list
Government Services
Pay for Lok Sewa, IRD, DOFE, SSF, traffic fines, and more
File and renew company registrations (OCR), pay municipal taxes
Financial Services
Renew DEMAT/MeroShare
Pay insurance premiums (Nepal Life, Neco, Sanima, etc.)
Pay EMIs (Syakar, Hulas, MAW, Jeevan Bikas)
Credit card bill payments
Remittance
Receive money from abroad via WorldRemit, Remitly
Send/receive domestic transfers through City Express, Bhatbhateni, Nepal Remit & more
Khalti Bazaar
Shop in-app from brands like Cowmandu, The Village Café, Sparrow SMS & others
Scan & Pay with Khalti QR
Accepted at your local kirana pasal, restaurants, clinics, fashion stores & more
Bank Services
Transfer to any major bank in Nepal
Link your bank account with Khalti Bank Direct
Make direct payments from your linked bank
Send & Request Money
Send funds to friends and family or request money with a few taps
Coupons & Rewards
Apply Promcodes & Coupons at checkout to get instant cashback
Use Daami Points to unlock exciting rewards


Smart Deposit
Save regularly with Nepal’s first wallet-based recurring deposit
Choose your amount (Starting from 100 upto 5000), frequency (daily/weekly/monthly), and term (6–60 months)
Earn interest and build your saving habit with ease


KYC & Security
Upgrade your account with KYC for easy transactions and added security


Load Wallet Easily
Load via mobile/internet banking, debit/credit card, Khalti Pasal, Sewa Kendra, bank deposits & more
Ek Nepal. Ek App. Ek Wallet. Infinite Possibilities
Khalti is more than a digital wallet, it’s a movement to make finance easier, more accessible, and more rewarding. Whether you’re recharging your phone or saving for your future, Khalti is built to support you at every step.


Need Help or Have Suggestions?
We’d love to hear from you.
Email:  support@khalti.com
Website: https://khalti.com
Blogs for more info: https://blog.khalti.com

Citizens Bank’s mobile banking gives you immediate and secure account access from your mobile device. Manage your money anytime, anywhere. Stay alert with account activity with customizable account alerts. Take advantage of all of these options and more by signing up for Citizens Bank’s digital banking now.
Meroshare is an application developed by CDSC for providing the services that are offered by CDSC to the investors in the Nepalese Capital Market.

Global Smart Plus is the most secure and convenient application available on both Mobile and Web platforms. Global Smart Plus, an Omni-channel with a single sign-on allows the customer to use the same login credentials irrespective of the channels used. The use of the Native Mobile App adds to speed, reliability, and better user interface leading to customer satisfaction.
Global Smart Plus surmounts the current Digital Banking spectrum, generating ample room for the customers to make daily transactions easier, secure, sound and handful. Irrespective of channels used Customers can now leverage one user credential to receive and make payments and use all of the features in Global Smart Plus Application.

Features our Customers can benefit with:

Fund Transfer 
Intra-Bank and Inter-Bank fund transfers have never been so easy and sound. 

Interoperable QR
Different QR and many applications to install. Leave that hassle aside, Global Smart Plus serves it all. Customers can scan, pay and receive via our Interoperable QR.

QR Withdrawal
QR Withdrawal in every bank branch and teller. No queue to withdraw cash. It’s so Simple.

Online Account Opening
Any retail customer can open a bank account instantly in a few simple steps from anywhere and anytime to avoid physical visits to the bank.

Online Fixed Deposit 
Fixed Deposit process made all easy with Global Smart Plus. No matter where you are, instantly apply for Fixed Deposit.

Bill Payments
Global Smart Plus offers a full throttled package of all bill payments. Real-time payments to all registered ISPs, TVs, Airlines, Insurance, Electricity, Water, Landline. 

Government Payments
LokSewa, Traffic, Passport, Inland Revenue, CIT, SSF, FCGO, OCR, Global Smart Plus is the new roller coaster for all government payments.

Cable Car 
Chandagiri Hills, Annapurna, Lumbini, Manakamana and Maulakalika Cable Car, book your favorite holiday gateways with Global Smart Plus. 

Capital Market Payments
Demat, Broker, Mero Share and all bank credit card payments with your own Global Smart Plus.

HBL HI-MB  Plus is a convenient and reliable banking app that provides you all the banking facilities in your fingertips.
The application is applicable to all the customers having their HBL bank accounts with HI-MB Plus Subscriptions.

Features provided by our HI-MB service:
1. Same bank and other bank fund transfer.
2. Card Management.
3. Loans View and Fixed deposit view
4. QR payment associated with NepalPay and eSewa.
5. Account Statement and Transfer Activities.
6. Balance Enquiry.
7. Information regarding banking hour
8. Find HBL ATM and HBL Branches
9. Foreign exchange rate
10. ConnectIPS 
11. Utility Payment (NEA Payments, Top Ups, etc).

Download the nBank app and revolutionize the way you bank digitally. Your bank in your pocket.
 
 
nBank, an initiative by Nabil Bank. Simply put, nBank is a 100% digital banking platform. Open an account, complete your KYC, pay your bills, deposit your money, and get loans without stepping into a physical Bank branch. Your banking app personalized just for you.
 
Of course, if you’d like to visit a branch, any one of Nabil Bank’s branches will be more than delighted to serve you with a smile.
 
So, what exactly does nBank have? Check out a few of our features:
 
Not just an app, a Superapp
Pay your bills, book flight tickets, calculate your EMI.
 
Without logging in.
 
That’s right. You can access a host of services right from the login page. Swipe the bar at the bottom to reveal plenty of things you can do:
• nRemit: Send money from any corner of the world to a Nabil Bank Account
• Mobile Cash: Withdraw funds from a Nabil Bank ATM without using a card
• Get in Touch: Call, Email, Viber, or book an appointment with a Nabil Bank representative
• Topup: Topup your mobile or landline on-the-go
• Bills: Pay your Electricity, Water, Internet, and TV Bills
• Payments: Make government payments, flight bookings, and insurance payments
• Interest Rates: Check out Nabil Bank’s latest Interest Rates for Deposit and Loan Products
• EMI Calculator: Plan your loan amount and tenure with the help of our EMI Calculator
• Exchange Rate: Check out the Bank’s Exchange Rate for the day
 
…and those are just a few things you can do without logging in.
 
Interested? There’s more.
 
Quick Account Opening
Open your bank account within seconds.
 
You know how opening a bank account can be a long and tiring process? Not anymore. If you’re a Nepalese citizen, you can open an account with us in under 30 seconds. Fill up your basic details and you’re ready to go! Use your app with a few transactional limitations.
 
And if you want to unlock the full potential of your account, simply complete your KYC – all from the comfort of your home, office, restaurant, you name it.
 
Digital KYC
Complete your KYC online. No Branch visits required.
 
Fill up your Know-Your-Customer details in the app, and attend a virtual KYC session to complete your KYC requirements. You will not need to wait in a physical queue anywhere. We promise.
 
Register with International Number
If you’re residing abroad, you can register for the nBank app using your international number and operate your Bank account. You will receive SMS Alerts, OTP notifications, and even news & alerts from Nabil Bank.
Remittance made simple
Besides sending money within Nepal, customers residing abroad can send money from their international banks directly to a Nabil Bank Account using their Mastercard or Visa Cards by selecting nRemit. All you need to do is fill up a form with the sender and receiver details, along with the amount (in USD) to be sent. The receiver will get the money directly into their Nabil Bank account within seconds.
 
Save, Spend, and Borrow
You can do it all at the touch of a button.
 
• View your account statement
• Report a disputed transaction
• Open a Fixed Deposit
• Add your Debit/Credit/Prepaid Cards
• Apply for a Virtual iCard for your online USD payments
• Go cardless with Mobile Cash
• Load your mobile wallets
• Pay your bills
• Scan a QR Code and pay instantly
• Redeem your loyalty points at your favorite restaurant, coffee place, or shop
• Schedule your payments
• Send money to a Bank Account within Nepal
• Add your favorite accounts
• Get instant digital loan
• Get a Loan Against your Fixed Deposit
 
Simple, Quick, Secure
Log in to your app with your faceID (for iOS 10 & above) or touchID without the hassle of passwords or PINs.
 
 
*Disclosure
By downloading the nBank App, you consent to the installation of this app and its future updates and upgrades. You can withdraw your consent at any time by deleting the app from your device.

NIC ASIA's MoBank welcomes you to the world of smart and digital banking. 
MoBank is NIC ASIA Bank's Official Mobile Banking Application and a Member of Fonepay Network which includes a variety of attractive discounts and offers along with many wondrous features.
Banking has never been so simple and easier before. Enjoy hassle-free banking anywhere and anytime without visiting your branch and manage your Bank Account with a fully secure and user-friendly application.

Below are the key features of NIC ASIA MoBank:

1. Banking On the Go.
2. IPO apply.
3. Send Remittance.
4. eCommerce Activation.
5. Fixed Deposit.
6. Cardless Withdrawal.
7. Customer Care.
8. Easy Utility/Bill Payments.
9. Convenient Mobile Top Up/Recharge.
10. Fund/Money Transfers Made Easier.
11. QR Payment with QR Code: Scan and Pay.
12. Instant Online and Retail Payment with secured Network.
13. Easy digital banking app.
14. Accessing your Account Information Made Easier.
15. User Friendly, Safe, and Secure using 128-bit SSL encryption.
16. Attractive Discounts at more than 2500+ merchants.
17. Periodical MoBank campaigns with amazing offers.

And Many More Exciting Features.

How to use this Application?

1.	Have a valid account at NIC ASIA Bank. 
2.	Subscribe to the NIC ASIA Bank's Mobile Banking Service. 

Go Digital. Smart Banking for Smart People.

This Application gets regularly updated with new features for the user's convenience which makes it the best app for online banking.

Please share your feedback, query, or any issue associated with MoBank at feedback@nicasiabank.com or call us at our toll-free number- 16600177771 or + 977-01- 5970101.

NMB Bank’s new Mobile Banking App is called eNMB, it provides banking on the go for all existing retail banking customers.
If you are not an existing NMB Bank customer, you can open a savings account by visiting your nearest branch and then experience banking through our new application.

If you are an existing NMB bank customer, you can download the application follow the simple one-time activation process, and experience the new digital experience.
The new application is the first step towards the digital journey started by NMB Bank, the users can experience 

• Self services:
 - Self application activation for NMB Bank retail banking customers.
 - PIN reset.
 - Navigate to branches.
 - Navigate to ATM.
 - Contact support.
 - Change PIN.
 - FAQ

• Banking on the go services:
 - View Accounts.
 - View FD.
 - View Loans.
 - Inter Bank Fund Transfer.
 - Intra Bank Fund Transfer.
 - Schedule Transfer.
 - Add Payee
 - Direct Transfer to Payee.
 - Create FD.
 - Email TDS.
 - Download & Email Statement

• Services:
 - Stop check.
 - Occupation change.
 - Update marital status.
 - Update VAT/PAN.
 - Update the purpose of A/C.
 - Update the source of funds for A/C.
 - Update change in anticipated transactions to A/C.
 - Update number per year for the A/C.
 - Update temporary address

• Pay Your Bills:
 - Pay school fees.
 - Pay water bill.
 - Pay electricity bill.
 - Topup

Get started:
To get started with eNMB, you just need your Customer Information File Number (CIF), In case you do not know your CIF number the application provides the option to fetch this number, you can follow the instructions.

The app will take you through a one-time activation process when you download the mobile application and start the activation.
eNMB App requires the following permissions:
 - Location: This is required for locating and navigating to the branches and ATM.
 - Photos / Media / Files / Camera: This is required to let you access the gallery / click an image to set a profile picture.

Please note that your data is safe with NMB Bank. We do not share any information with the third party without your initiation.
We never call you asking for your PIN, CIF, or Account numbers, please avoid giving such information to callers on the phone, email, or any other media for the security of your account.

Smart Banking for Smart People.

connectIPS is a single payments platform that allows the customers to link their bank account(s) to enable payment processor, fund transfer and creditors payments. An extended product of Nepal Clearing House to support citizen-to-government (C2G), customer-to-business (C2B) and peer-to-peer (P2P) payment transactions directly from/to the bank accounts.

One of the best NEPSE stock portfolio management app where you can get all the information about Nepali share market . You can add unlimited portfolio, stock alerts, watchlists and many more. We provide real-time NEPSE alerts, notifications about upcoming ipo, fpo.

1. Free Portfolio management

Experience the legacy of IME now on your smartphone. Presenting IME Pay!

With the aim to simplify daily life for all Nepalese, IME introduced IME Pay for easy, quick, and hassle-free online digital payments for day-to-day services. Licensed by Nepal Rastra Bank (NRB) and powered by IME Remit, IME Pay is now a leading payment gateway in Nepal.

IME Pay is an advanced digital wallet that allows users to transfer money from wallet to wallet, pay utility bills and make purchases online or offline instantly with a few quick taps on their smartphones. It essentially brings all cash transactions to the tips of your fingers, from basic household purchases to high volume business trades. With our wide range of partners and merchants, we are dedicated to ease your everyday life by providing you the most lucrative offers.

With Nepal’s largest IME network of 25,000+ touchpoints, we encourage our customers to make smart and safe payments digitally, within the convenience of their smartphones. All your payments are just a tap away with IME Pay!

Our Features include:

MONEY TRANSFER

Add Money

You can load money into your IME wallet account from various available mediums:

• Linked Bank
• E-banking/M-banking
• Connect IPS
• Nearby Agents

IME Pay users can enjoy free banking transactions with linked banks like Global IME Bank, NIC Asia Bank, Siddhartha Bank, Bank of Kathmandu, Kumari Bank, NIBL Bank, and other banks.

Send Money

Send money feature makes IME Pay users to conveniently send/ transfer money to desired destinations:

• IME Pay Wallet transfer
• Cash Pickup
• Bank Deposit

Withdraw Money

You can withdraw the desired amount from nearby IME Agents. Scan the QR code located in agent counters and cash out the desired amount.

Request Money

You can also request the desired amount to your friends and family. Both parties should be IME Pay users.

UTILITY BILLS PAYMENT

You can make quick and easy payments with a few taps on your smartphone. We offer a wide range of facilities to our valued customers. Our services include:

• Mobile Top-up (NTC, Ncell & SmartCell)
• Landline (Nepal Telecom)
• Electricity (Nepal Electricity Authority NEA)
• Water (Khanepani)
• TV (DishHome, MeroTV, SkyTV and more)
• Internet (Worldlink, Vianet, Subisu, ADSL and more)
• EMI (MAW Investment, Jagdamba Credit &Hulas)
• Insurance Premium (IME General Insurance, Sagarmatha, NECO & more)

MERCHANT PAYMENTS

You can make payments for products and services at IME Pay registered merchants including restaurants, cafes, convenience stores, and more. Scan QR codes placed in the payment counter at the merchant location or search for the merchant directly in the app. You can find various discounts and offers available at merchants in the “Deals” section.

TICKETING

We provide the option to find tickets according to your preferences and buy tickets directly from your smartphone. You can instantly book tickets via IME Pay for the following services:

• Airlines
• Movie Tickets
• Chandragiri Hills Cable Car

EVENTS

Ticketing and Voting are facilitated by IME Pay where you can instantly purchase tickets to available events. Vote for your favorite contestants in TV shows or any other competitions integrated into the app.

No more queue! No more traffic jams! No more penalty!

Live a smart life, choose IME Pay today, and pay all your bills anytime from anywhere instantly!

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

With the new Fonepay App, you can now SPEND, EARN AND SAVE your money. Store all your accounts and wallets and make safe and seamless payments - all with Fonepay App.

HERE’S HOW IT WORKS
Download and signup for Fonepay App in a few minutes and get access to all the new features. All your points are already saved if you’re a user of Fonepay Services. 

LINK YOUR BANK ACCOUNTS AND WALLETS
Link and save your Bank Accounts and Wallets - all in one place. Get easy access to your funds directly from the Fonepay App. 

EASY FUND TRANSFERS
Send money to your friends and families through saved contacts by using mobile number or account details, using Fonepay Direct.

MAKE INSTANT PAYMENTS 
Make easy and seamless payments at your favorite merchant spots by Scanning QR code. You can also make Offline Payments using FoneTAG (Fonepay Tap and Go) or Customer Presented QR from the App - making your payment easy and seamless. Look out for NFC Symbol at Merchant Terminals. 

EARN REWARDS AND REDEEM
Earn even more rewards with the Fonepay App! Stack your rewards by making payments through Fonepay and redeem the collected reward points at your favorite merchants.

GET EXCLUSIVE OFFERS
Get exclusive discounts and offers in Airlines, Beauty and Fashion, Clothing and Accessories, Entertainment, Events, Food and Dining, Travel & Tours, and many more. Turn on your location and know about offers near you. 

Need help? 
Get in touch with us at csd@fonepay.com
